column4: When I log in, I am told: "42 packages can be updated.  68 updates are security updates.", but when I run:  "sudo apt-get update" it goes through a bunch of packages, says Hit on all of them, then says it's down without updating anything.  What am I doing wrong?
Won't that upgrade to the next version?  I don't want to change OS versions, just get standard packages
update updates the list of packages, "upgrade" upgrades all the currently installed packages to new versions
